author: cnbc.com
title: KeyW CEO to Present at 39th Annual Cowen Aerospace/Defense and Industrials Conference
text:
HANOVER, Md., Feb. 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The KeyW Holding Corporation (NASDAQ:KEYW) today announced that Bill Weber , president and chief executive officer, will present at the Cowen Aerospace/Defense & Industrials Conference in New York City, at the Lotte NY Palace , on February 7, 2018 at approximately 10:00 a.m. Eastern time.
Register on the Cowen website to view the live broadcast on the day of the presentation. Interested parties can also view a replay of the presentation the following day on the Events and Presentations tab on the investor portion of KeyWâ€™s website , which will be archived for 90 days following the event.
About KeyW
KeyW is a pure-play national security solutions provider for the Intelligence, Cyber and Counterterrorism Communities' toughest challenges. We support the collection, processing, analysis and dissemination of information across the full spectrum of their missions. We employ and challenge more than 2,000 of the most talented professionals in the industry with solving such complex problems as preventing cyber threats, transforming data into intelligence and combating global terrorism. Please visit www.keywcorp.com and follow us on Twitter, @keywcorp, for more information.
